column6: "THIN AIR" PART 4 (OF 5) GUEST-STARRING SPIDER-MAN AND THE GREEN GOBLIN! BY THE CREATORS OF "ULTIMATE SPIDER-MAN!" Spider-Man guest-stars!!  As tensions between the Bugle and Norman Osborn mount, what side will Peter Parker take?  Featuring the Ben Urich moment you've been waiting for for twenty years!! "A-", says Entertainment Weekly. "A", says CBG. "A-", says Cinescape. 'It's amazing," says "Ultimate Spider-Man" writer Brian Bendis!
column8: | penciller:Mark Bagley | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | inker:Scott Hanna | penciller (cover):Mike Mayhew | colorist:Peter Pantazis
